title: The.Chronicles.of.Riddick.Assault.on.Dark.Athena.Repack-R.G.Mech

Game information:

The collection contains both the original Ã‚Â«The Chronicles of Riddick:
Escape From Butcher BayÃ‚Â», and the continuation of this amazing stealth
action Ã‚Â«Chronicles of Riddick: Assault on Dark AthenaÃ‚Â»! In the Ã‚Â«Escape
From Butcher BayÃ‚Â» you are in prison maximum security "Butcher BayÃ‚Â»
(Butcher Bay), located on a remote penal colony for extraterrestrial.
No prisoner had never been able to escape from there. Institution
consists of several wings to the rising level of protection, and
underground mine development inhabit dangerous aggressive creatures.

The main hero of the game is Richard B. Riddick, "played" and announced
that a key character of both films, which ushered in the franchise - Vin
Diesel. Riddick caught a bounty hunter William J.. Jones, is a psychopath
killer, who was recently transferred to Butcher Bay, and who intends to
use all means available to it for a long time not to linger. To do this
he will have to pass three circles of hell that terrible institution
(zone single-max, double-max, and finally triple-max, in which prisoners
were placed in cryogenic sleep and wake up every day just two minutes to
perform the necessary procedures), as well as to meet with the sinister
inhabitants of the sewers and mines.

The plot Ã‚Â«Assault on Dark AthenaÃ‚Â» begins immediately after the events of
the first part. It so happened that Jones, who brought the original
Riddick in "Butcher Bay", and helped him escape from there. On his ship,
in a state of suspended animation, they are tightened to "Dark AthenaÃ‚Â»
(Dark Athena) - a giant ship of mercenaries controlled Gale Revas and
her Deputy Skinner. Riddick avoids capture, then he will try to free
the captives, including former captain of the "Dark Athena", and also
help the little girl Lynne, hiding in ventilation shafts. And when Riddick
after the ordeal finally able to leave the evacuation shuttle scored the
eyeballs automated soulless drone ship, fate once again causing him a
heavy blow ... Does he have to go back to "Dark Athena"?


Game Features:

You have to go more than 30 gaming scenes of varying complexity in three
areas of the prison Butcher Bay and the ship Dark Athena.
Choose your own path to freedom: wade in dark corridors and narrow tunnels,
climb stairs, or enter a fierce exchange of fire in open spaces.
Riddick withstand more than 20 types of enemies that will appear as the
game progresses. Will have to fight not only to guard the prison,
but prisoners, robots.
Escape to freedom hero help 15 weapons - from the Ã‚Â«originalÃ‚Â» knives,
hooks up to assault rifles, shotguns and explosives.
